John,

We met at the Atlanta Code Camp, in 2013. I was the guy who drove you to the airport.

I was talking with John Sonmez regarding a recent post of his. The topic was a mom wanting to get back into the dev biz. This sparked an idea to do a one-day event, called “Moms who code.” The idea, based on John’s video, would be to help educate moms: 1) Re-boot their dev skills 2) Direct them to resources to continue learning

I’m still brainstorming this idea, but want to reach out and see if you would like to be part of this idea.

Kindest Regards Bill Fink (wifink@Microsoft.com) AUTHOR: Bill Fink AUTHOR EMAIL: wifink@Microsoft.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: [John Papa] Connect IP: 162.194.140.189 Array ( [1_Name] => Bill Fink [2_Email] => wifink@Microsoft.com [3_Website] => [4_Comment] => John,
